title: Video: Le Galaxie – Love System
body:
Absolutely love this new video from Irish quartet **Le Galaxie**, directed by Brendan Canty of Feel Good Lost.

A modern love story, shot in beautiful colour and amidst perfect settings, not to mention the brilliant costumes, it expertly captures those moments of lust, love and madness. Check it out below, and catch Le Galaxie at CMJ next month.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
